name: Lottery Power Picks Drawing Results
description: This extension displays the LPP lottery results for various US and International lotteries.

sandbox.content_security_policy: sandbox allow-scripts allow-forms; script-src http://www.lotterypowerpicks.com/ http://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/ http://googlesyndication.com/ http://www.google-analytics.com/ http://www.gmodules.com/ https://www.google.com/;
